ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 8 Sep 1999, Kirk Baptista wrote:

> Wasn't this the reasoning they gave when they put in the kiting "fix"? That
> nobody should get experience/loot from a mob with little or no risk? kiting
> is FAR more acceptable to me than outright KSing. Wonder why one is okay and
> the other they must fix?

Not sure about kiting - I think the reasoning for that was it
allowed certain classes to kill mobs much more difficult than
others were capable of.

The risk thing was the rationale behind the lore item change.
Brad was playing the game and got upset that some high level
characters were harvesting low level mobs for the equipment.
Apparently he doesn't mind harvesting, but he does mind if you
do it without taking any risk (i.e. killing easy green stuff).

And yes, I'm as baffled as you are as to why they haven't done
a thing about kill stealing.
